articles.content: A recent article published on the bioRxiv* preprint server reports that the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) NVX-CoV2373 vaccine triggers robust neutralization against the severe acute respiratory… [+6820 chars]

articles.author: Alex Oliveira
articles.title: Scientists develop chewing gum which could finally end COVID pandemic - Daily Mail
articles.description: The gum contains a plant-grown protein which traps the SARS-CoV-2 virus inside saliva, which slows transmission not just from person to person but also from cell to cell in one patient
articles.content:
Scientists have developed a chewing gum they say can trap COVID-19 in saliva, reducing symptoms and lowering the risk of passing the virus on.
